Comments_List: Thorough understanding of Middle Egyptian grammar and language.

Strengths: clear teaching style and very useful assignments.
Weaknesses: none that I can think of!
Yes! A fascinating grammar & culture class. Reading the Shipwrecked Sailor was a lot of fun and really helped illuminate how grammar was used in context.
